name: Glen Burnie Bancorp
description: Glen Burnie Bancorp is a community-focused financial institution based in Glen Burnie, Maryland. Founded in 1947, the bank has established itself as a reliable provider of banking services to individuals and businesses in the local community. Glen Burnie Bancorp operates through its subsidiary, the Bank of Glen Burnie, which offers a wide range of financial products including personal and commercial banking, mortgage lending, and investment services. The bank prides itself on its commitment to customer service, aiming to build long-lasting relationships with its clients by providing tailored financial solutions. With a focus on community development, Glen Burnie Bancorp actively participates in local initiatives and supports various charitable organizations. The bank's mission is to enhance the financial well-being of its customers while contributing to the economic growth of the region. By leveraging technology and maintaining a strong local presence, Glen Burnie Bancorp continues to adapt to the evolving needs of its customers, ensuring that it remains a key player in the competitive banking landscape.

seo.meta_title: Glen Burnie Bancorp | Community Bank in Glen Burnie, MD
seo.meta_description: Glen Burnie Bancorp is a community-focused bank offering a range of personal and commercial banking services in Maryland. Discover our commitment to customer service and community growth.

faq.question: What services does Glen Burnie Bancorp offer?
faq.answer: Glen Burnie Bancorp offers personal banking, commercial banking, mortgage services, and investment services.

faq.question: Where is Glen Burnie Bancorp headquartered?
faq.answer: Glen Burnie Bancorp is headquartered in Glen Burnie, Maryland, USA.

faq.question: When was Glen Burnie Bancorp founded?
faq.answer: Glen Burnie Bancorp was founded in 1947.
